TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RuleActionTrackingEvent extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains the name, instance ID, and condition result of a rule that has been evaluated.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the RuleActionTrackingEvent class. This code example is part of the RuleActionTrackingEventSample SDK Sample from the ConsoleTrackingService.cs file. Docs.summary: Gets the result of the condition evaluation.
Docs.value: The result of the rule condition: or .

remarks.format:

remarks.format:
